name: Woocommerce Custom Tab Lite
author: phoeniixx

sections.description:
FREE VERSION LIVE DEMO | FREE VERSION DOCUMENTATION LINK

Overview

With the custom tabs plugin you can add more tabs to your product to give a better picture of your products on your Ecommerce store.

It’s a useful plugin that will help you customize your product descriptions so that your customers get to browse and know more about your products and services and the best possible fashion

With this plugin you can:

  1. Define specific tabs for the description of your products
  2. Customize your product descriptions in line with your product range

Custom Tab Free Features:

  • The plugin is compatible with our Support Ticket System by Phoeniixx plugin
  • For every tab you get to give a title to your tab as well as the space where you can add the description that is line with the title that you have given to that tab.
  • Any additional tabs that you create with the Custom Tabs plugin will be applicable to all the products on your website.
  • The custom tabs plugin gives you the freedom to create as many tabs as you see fit for your product range.

FREE VERSION LIVE DEMO | FREE VERSION DOCUMENTATION LINK

Take a look at how to create custom tab in product page in woocommerce

Premium Features:

PREMIUM VERSION LIVE DEMO | PREMIUM VERSION LINK | DOCUMENTATION LINK

  • Global Tab Option allows you to have a common tab on all of the product pages, irrespective of their product categories.
  • Category Tab Option allows you to show a tab that is common only to same-category products. Tab specifications could only vary from category to category.
  • Product-Specific Tab Option lets you have a tab that is unique to a particular product page.
  • Tab Placement Option lets you sequence your tabs as per your priority.
  • You could Sort, Re-order, Rename or Enable/Disable the default tabs as per your requirement.
  • You can also add shortcode in the custom tabs.

PREMIUM VERSION LIVE DEMO | PREMIUM VERSION LINK | DOCUMENTATION LINK

Premium WordPress Themes

Here is our premium wordpress theme

  • Foody Themes
  • Jstore Themes
  • Eezy Themes
  • Craze Themes
  • Seofication Themes
  • News Prime Themes

Our Website

  • https://www.phoeniixx.com/

Support Email

  • support@phoeniixx.com

NOTE

  • Our plugin support the Multisite Network.
sections.installation:
1. Install WordPress
  2. Go to your WordPress admin panel, and then to Plugins. Click on “Add New” and then upload the zip file of the plugin using the “Upload Plugin” button you can find on top of the screen.
  3. For the plugin to work as it should, WooCommerce plugin has to be installed and enabled.

short_description: With the Custom Tabs plugin, You can give your products a unique touch by providing specific tabs for their products.
